name: Appeal of LP GROUP 2, INC. from a Decision by the Board of Labor Standards. Petition of Garnett C. Littlepage

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of May, 2012, the Petition for Review is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

46 A.3d 1284
